member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for working with XML documentation files.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationExtensions.GetDescription(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Returns the description for the assembly.
member.remarks: The description is read from the attribute of the assembly.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationExtensions.GetInformationalVersion(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Returns the informational version for the assembly.
member.remarks: The version info is read from the attribute of the assembly.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationExtensions.GetProductName(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Returns the product name for the assembly.
member.remarks: The product name is read from the attribute of the assembly.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationExtensions.ToDisplayName(System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary: Returns the display name for the given .
member.remarks: A method display name is unique within its declaring type.
member.param: The method for which to return the display name.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationExtensions.ToDisplayName(System.Reflection.ParameterInfo)
member.summary: Returns the display name for the parameter.
member.param: The parameter to return the display name for.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationExtensions.ToDisplayName(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the display name for the given type.
member.remarks: This method also supports breaking up generic types including the display names of the generic type arguments too.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationNodeBase.DocumentationNode
member.summary: Returns the XML node representing the documentation.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationNodeBase.ChildNodes(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the child nodes with the given name.
member.param: The name of the child nodes to return.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser
member.summary: A utility class that helps you parse XML documentation files.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class from the given XML document object.
member.param: The XML document containing the documentation to parse.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class from the given string.
member.param: The XML string representing the XML documentation document to parse.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.AssemblyName
member.summary: Returns the name of the assembly whose XML documentation is loaded into the parser.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.AssemblyVersion
member.summary: The informational version of the assembly.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.AssemblyProductName
member.summary: The product name defined in the assembly.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.AssemblyDescription
member.summary: The description of the assembly.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.Document
member.summary: The XML document object containing the XML documentation.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.GetDocumentation(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the documentation for the given type.
member.param: The type to return the documentation for.
member.returns: Returns an instance of the class representing the documentation. If documentation representing the given type is not found, null is returned.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.GetDocumentation(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the documentation for the the type specified in .
member.param: The full name of the type whose documentation to return.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.GetMethods(Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.TypeDocumentation)
member.summary: Returns the methods for the given .
member.param: The type for which to return the methods.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.GetNamespaces
member.summary: Returns a list of namespaces representing the types documented in the loaded XML documentation.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.GetProperties(Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.TypeDocumentation)
member.summary: Returns the properties defined on the given type.
member.param: The type for which to return the properties.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.GetType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the type represented by . The assembly that the current parser instance represent is used when searching for the type.
member.param: The full type name of the type to return.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParser.GetTypes(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the types documented in the given namespace.
member.param: The namespace whose types to return.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParserFactory
member.summary: Manages multiple instances.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParserFactory.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParserFactory.AddParser(System.String,System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Adds a parser to the factory with the given using the given document.
member.param: The key to add the parser with. If a parser with the given key exists, it will be overwritten.
The XML document to use to create a object to add.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParserFactory.AddParser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a parser to the factory with the given using the given string.
member.param: The key to add the parser with. If a parser with the given key exists, it will be overwritten.
The XML string to use to create a object to add.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParserFactory.AddParser(System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Adds a parser representing the given assembly to the factory.
member.remarks: This method tries to find an embedded resource from the assembly with the name of the assembly file name with an .xml extension, and assumes that if such a resource is found, that resource contains the XML documentation for the assembly.
member.param: The key to add the parser with. If a parser with the given key exists, it will be overwritten.
The assembly to search for embedded XML documents in.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParserFactory.GetParserKeys
member.summary: Returns a collection of keys representing parsers loaded into the current factory.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParserFactory.GetParser(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the parser with the given .
member.param: The key of the parser to return.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParserFactory.GetParser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the parser with the given key.
member.remarks: If a parser with the given key does not exist, one will be created using the given string and added to the factory for further use.
member.param: The key representing the parser to return.
Optional. The XML string to create a parser from in case a parser does not exist with the specified .

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParserFactory.GetParser(System.String,System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Returns the parser with the given key.
member.remarks: If a parser with the given key does not exist, one will be created using the given document and added to the factory for further use.
member.param: The key representing the parser to return.
Optional. The XML document to create a parser from in case a parser does not exist with the specified .

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParserFactory.GetParserByTypeName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the parser that can resolve the type specified in .
member.param: The full name of the type to find a parser for.
member.returns: The method returns a where Item1 contains the key for the parser, Item2 contains the actual parser, and Item3 contains the type that was resolved by the parser.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.DocumentationParserFactory.GetType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the that represents the given .
member.remarks: If one is not directly resolved from that name, then each of the assemblies loaded into the current are enumerated and used to complete the given .
member.param: The full name of the type to return.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.MemberDocumentation`1
member.summary: Represents the base class for all kinds of member documentation nodes.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: The XML node representing the documentation for the member.
The member that represents.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.MemberDocumentation`1.DocumentedMember
member.summary: Returns the reflection member that the documenation represents.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.MemberDocumentation`1.Name
member.summary: Returns the name of the member.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.MemberDocumentation`1.Summary
member.summary: Returns the summary node from the documentation.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.MemberDocumentation`1.Remarks
member.summary: Returns the remarks node from the documentation.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.MemberDocumentation`1.Exceptions
member.summary: Returns the exception nodes from the documentation.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.MemberDocumentation`1.ToString
member.summary: Returns the string representation of the documentation.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.MethodDocumentation
member.summary: Represents documentation for a method, encapsulating a type.
member.remarks: This documentation type is used for both methods and constructors.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.MethodDocumentation.Parameters
member.summary: Returns the param nodes from the documentation.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.MethodDocumentation.Returns
member.summary: The returns node from the documentation.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.MethodDocumentation.GetParameters
member.summary: Returns the parameters for the current method.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.ParameterDocumentation
member.summary: Represents documentation for a method parameter.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.ParameterDocumentation.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.Reflection.ParameterInfo)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: The XML documentation node for the parameter.
Information about the reflected parameter.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.ParameterDocumentation.DocumentedParameter
member.summary: Returns the parameteter info for the parameter.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.ParameterDocumentation.Name
member.summary: Returns the name of the parameter.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.ParameterDocumentation.ToString
member.summary: Returns the string representation of the parameter.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.PropertyDocumentation
member.summary: Represents documentation for a property, encapsulating a type.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.PropertyDocumentation.Value
member.summary: Returns the value node from the documentation.
member.remarks: For details on the value node, see https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/csharp/programming-guide/xmldoc/value.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.TypeDocumentation
member.summary: Represents the documentation for a object.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.TypeDocumentation.Namespace
member.summary: Returns the namespace of the type.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.TypeDocumentation.ToString
member.summary: Returns the string representation of the object.
